name: Studio Nord
tagline: Studio Nord is an award-winning design and develop
description:
Studio Nord is an award-winning design and development studio from Istanbul, committed to creating cutting-edge digital solutions and engaging multi-platform experiences. Studio Nord was founded in May of 2011. Company is made up of experienced interface designers and mobile developers who have worked at award winning local and global digital agencies such as Tribal DDB, C-Section etc.
Specialties
Mobile Advertising, Mobile Applications, Digital Design, Digital Advertising, Digital Marketing, Digital strategy, Social Media Consultancy, Interface Design, UX-UI, iPhone Applications, and iOS & Android Development
